name: pnp-powerapps-samples-timer
title: timer
shortDescription: Example of how to use the timer function as a stopwatch
longDescription: This app is an example of how to use the timer function as a stopwatch.
You can specify predefined times and start the timer with them.
An easy to read visualization helps all users to estimate how much time has already passed.
This solution is optimized to use within Microsoft Teams meetings.
